text: The G.C.E. (O/L) examination will commence on Tuesday (12th Dec.) and will be continued until 21st December.The Ministry of Education said that the examination will start at 8.30 a.m. and that all the candidates should be present at the Exam Centers by 8. a.m.The candidates should bring with them admission paper and a valid Identity Card.The Ministry said that in-charge personnel of Exam Centers have been asked to be vigilant to prevent exam frauds.Smart wrist watches, smartphones, or other electronic device are barred to be used at the exam centers.
title: Special message for G.C.E. (O/L) student
